title: #221 - Living In A Post-Work Society
itunes:title: #221 - Living In A Post-Work Society
description: What does it mean to live post-work? How will society function when not everyone needs a job? Essentially, how can Connor and Dan get paid to be unemployed podcasters? Some of these questions will be answered on this weeks Drunken Philosophy which covers Michael Cholbi's recent article "The Desire To Work As An Adaptive Preference." Also, we an announcement regarding our back catalog!
